author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3639 - Modify MKahaDB To Support Using One Adapter Per Destination Without Explicity Listing Every Desintation In The Configuration. Add perDestination boolean attribute to mKahaDb filtered adapter. When true, every destination will get its own persistence adapter using the configured adapter as as template. So any config applied to the destination less (default) adapter will be reused
